description: External alterations, inluding extension to existing walkway to form a lobby and formation of a childrens play area for health centre
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Within 3 months of commencement of the devleopment te existing 'shrub bed' at the front of the Health Centre, facing Church Road shall be replanted with trees and shrubs, in accordance with details to be approved by the LPA.  Thereafter any trees or other plants which die or are removed within the first 5 years following implementation of the landscaping scheme shall be replaced during the next planting season.  REASON:  To ensure that the development is landscaped in the interests of the visual character and appearance of the area.
